short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: You have to pass the levels together as the red boy and blue girl in the mysterious temple.
short.bg: Трябва да преминете нивата заедно като червения момче и синьото момиче в тайнствения храм.
short.ca,no: Debes pasar los niveles juntos como el niño rojo y la niña azul en el misterioso templo.
short.cs: Musíte spolu projít úrovně jako červený kluk a modrá holka v tajemném chrámu.
short.da: Du skal passere niveauerne sammen som den røde dreng og den blå pige i det mystiske tempel.
short.de: Du musst die Level zusammen bestehen, als der rote Junge und das blaue Mädchen im mysteriösen Tempel.
short.el,es,hi: Tienes que pasar los niveles juntos como el chico rojo y la chica azul en el misterioso templo.
short.et,fr,nl,sk,vi: Vous devez passer les niveaux ensemble en tant que garçon rouge et fille bleue dans le temple mystérieux.
short.fi: Sinun täytyy läpäistä tasot yhdessä punaisena pojana ja sinisenä tyttönä salaperäisessä temppelissä.
short.fil: Kailangan niyong daanan ang mga antas nang sabay bilang ang red boy at blue girl sa misteryosong templo.
short.he: Debes pasar los niveles juntos como el niño rojo y la niña azul en el templo misterioso.
short.hr: Translations are currently unavailable for Croatian.
short.hu: Együtt kell végigjutnotok a szinteken a vörös fiú és kék lány szerepében a titokzatos templomban.
short.id: Kamu harus melewati level bersama-sama sebagai red boy dan blue girl di kuil misterius.
short.it,lt: Tienes que pasar los niveles juntos como el niño rojo y la niña azul en el misterioso templo.
short.ja: 赤い少年と青い少女として、神秘的な寺院のレベルを一緒にクリアする必要があります。
short.ko: 지금부터 내시청 어시스턴트와 함께 미스터리한 사원에서 레벨을 함께 클리어해야 해요. 레드 보이와 블루 걸로!
short.lv: Вам нужно проходить уровни вместе, в роли красного мальчика и синей девочки, в загадочном храме.
short.ms: Anda harus melewati level bersama sebagai bocah merah dan gadis biru di kuil misterius.
short.pl: Musisz przechodzić poziomy razem jako czerwony chłopiec i niebieska dziewczyna w tajemniczym świątyni.
short.ro: Trebuie să treceți nivelele împreună ca băiatul roșu și fata albastră în templul misterios.
short.ru: Вам нужно пройти уровни вместе, как красный мальчик и синяя девочка в таинственном храме.
short.sl: ඔබේ තැන්පත් මාවතේ බේබි කිරියට හෝ නිල් කිරියට සහය වන සුහදශසායක ශාස්ත්‍රවලට වෙන්කර ගැනීමට ඔබේ පහසුවෙහි තවත් ඉවත් කෙරෙනු ලබනු ඇත.
short.sr: Морате пролазити нивое заједно као црвени дечак и плава девојка у тајанственом храму.
short.sv: Tienes que pasar los niveles juntos como el chico rojo y la chica azul en el templo misterioso.
short.th: คุณต้องผ่านเลเวลพร้อมกันในฐานะเด็กชายสีแดงและเด็กสาวสีน้ำเงินในวัดลึกลับ
short.tr: Vous devez passer les niveaux ensemble en tant que garçon rouge et fille bleue dans le mystérieux temple.
short.uk: Debes pasar los niveles juntos como el chico rojo y la chica azul en el misterioso templo.
short.zh_CN: 你们必须作为红色男孩和蓝色女孩一起通过神秘的寺庙关卡。
short.zh_TW: 你必須一起過關，作為紅色男孩和藍色女孩，進入神秘的寺廟。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔴🔵 Redboy and Bluegirl Original - Elemental Duo Adventure! 🕹️💥

Embark on a captivating journey with Redboy and Bluegirl Original, now available on Chrome! This dynamic duo invites you to dive into a world of elemental puzzles, cooperative challenges, and exciting platform action. Can you master the synergy of fire and water to conquer each level and become the ultimate Elemental Explorer? 🌟🚀

🌟 Elemental Cooperative Gameplay: Team up with a friend or control both characters solo to solve intricate puzzles. Coordinate moves, overcome obstacles, and use the unique abilities of Redboy and Bluegirl to conquer every level's challenges! 🤝🔥💧

🎮 Responsive Controls, Dual Elemental Mastery: Enjoy responsive controls that make navigating the colorful world of Redboy and Bluegirl a breeze. The seamless gameplay ensures that players of all levels can enjoy the cooperative adventure! ⬆️🕹️

🎵 Enchanting Elemental Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the enchanting soundscape that complements the elemental theme. Each level becomes a rhythmic journey as Redboy and Bluegirl traverse the challenges in harmony! 🎶🌊🔥

🏆 Cooperate for Puzzle Supremacy: Challenge friends or embark on a solo journey to see who can conquer the elemental realms. The leaderboard awaits the ultimate Redboy and Bluegirl master - will you seize the top spot? 🏅👾

🚀 Why Redboy and Bluegirl Original?

🕹️ Instantly accessible on Chrome - dive into elemental fun without delay!
🌟 Vibrant visuals and cooperative gameplay for an engaging experience.
🔴🔵 Unleash the synergy of Redboy and Bluegirl in the original adventure!
👉 How to Start Your Elemental Expedition:

Click "Add to Chrome" to launch Redboy and Bluegirl Original.
Coordinate moves, solve puzzles, and embrace the elemental synergy.
Challenge friends, set high scores, and become the undisputed Elemental Explorer!
🚨 Ready for a cooperative journey of fire and water? Add Redboy and Bluegirl Original to Chrome now and dive into the original elemental adventure! 🔴🔵🕹️
